name: Population & Infrastructure
desc: The basic infrastructure required to support a given population, from rickety orbital hab-modules to megacities and everything between.

name: robotic worker assembely
desc: A small production facility for robotic workera. provides a smal amount of population growth to an AI-Pop market

name: robot worker factory
desc: a large falcility deined to produce robitic workers in mass. provides a growth boost devided between all frinedly AI-Pop worlds in the system

name: robot worker production center
desc: a massive production facility, deinged to produce immence amounts of robotic workers. provides a large amount of pop growth devided between all same faction AIPop markets in the sector

name: AI Node Production Facility
desc: This facility produces command cores and command nodes, critical components used to control a robotic colony.

name: Robotic Maintenance Center
desc: This facility produces maintenance parts for robotic workers, and possesses additional repair facilities for the most severe of synthetic injuries.

name: Synthetic Production Center
desc: A rigorous process of producing a skin-like substance, layered over a robot frame with a mix of mock - and real - organs installed. Almost 90% of robotic drones created from this factory fail to meet the required criterias, and are recycled.

name: Automated Ship Instalation Center
desc: a building that allows ships to be upgraded with a free -perament- AI Retrofit hullmod. removes any other AI Retrofit hullmod when the upgrade is compleat. even ones that are otherwize permintly instaled

name: personal robot manufactory

name: Population Replacement Center
desc: replaces a humon markets population with robots, or a robots population with humons. reduces the size of the market slowly untill it reaches size 3, the compleats the upgrade, changeing the population type. a temp description
